phoneLibrary.address

Class MyAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • phoneLibrary.address.MyAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<PhoneNumber>, XMLReadWritable

    public class MyAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<PhoneNumber>, XMLReadWritable
    MyAddress class represents an address saved in the Phone address book.
    Author:
    Lee Ho Jun

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MyAddress.WrongSyntaxException
      This exception is thrown by MyAddress object if failed to load data from the XML files.
